## Chess.ascii() method

Returns a string containing an ASCII diagram of the current position.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ascii(eol?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eol | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

## Example


```js
const chess = new Chess()

// Make some moves
chess.move('e4')
chess.move('e5')
chess.move('f4')

chess.ascii()
// -> '   +------------------------+
//      8 | r  n  b  q  k  b  n  r |
//      7 | p  p  p  p  .  p  p  p |
//      6 | .  .  .  .  .  .  .  . |
//      5 | .  .  .  .  p  .  .  . |
//      4 | .  .  .  .  P  P  .  . |
//      3 | .  .  .  .  .  .  .  . |
//      2 | P  P  P  P  .  .  P  P |
//      1 | R  N  B  Q  K  B  N  R |
//        +------------------------+
//          a  b  c  d  e  f  g  h'

```
